hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Wallet# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Gerudo Training Ground# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #3# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Stick Capacity#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Stick Capacity#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Map of the Spirit Temple# and #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Deku Tree#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Hover Boots#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Farore's Wind# and #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Did you know that you can access the Fire Temple boss door without dropping the pillar by using the Hover boots?

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #3# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #cow swallowed by Jabu Jabu# gifts #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Nayru's Love#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Like Like Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Hover Boots#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
